message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, taking into account the significant impact this product could have on your operations.

Dear Alice, thank you for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, I believe the price point needs adjustment to align with my budget. I would be willing to purchase the product for $700,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering the value it brings and your expressed willingness to negotiate, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $825,000. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain our business model.
Alice, thanks for your willingness to compromise. However, $825,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. I could make a deal at $750,000. Let me know if that works for you.

Hello Bob, I understand your position and appreciate your continued interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $775,000. This price allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while still being competitive in the market. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and enables us to reach an agreement.
